column1: iheed Medical Education for Healthcare Professionals (PGCert / PGDip / MSc)
column5: The new Certificate, Postgraduate Diploma and Masters in Medical Education for Healthcare Professionals is designed as an international programme for healthcare professionals across the globe who wish to work with leading experts to enhance their roles as clinical or academic teachers. Run by iheed, the courses are accredited by the University of Warwick.
column7: Get your programme guide to find out more: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: PGCert: 6 months; PGDip: 12 months; MSc: 22 months
